markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Iruxi Glide](/Feats.aspx?ID=2407) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Lizardfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=226" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 46 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Cloudleaper Lizardfolk](/Heritages.aspx?ID=104) heritage

</column>

---

You glide slowly toward the ground, 5 feet down and up to 25 feet forward through the air. As long as you spend at least 1 action gliding each round and haven't yet reached the ground, you remain in the air at the end of your turn.
name: Iruxi Glide
